name: Agent Bean (LowBudgetGameDev)
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the Trijam #205.

You are a bean tasked with stealing classified objects from a criminal organization like documents, weapons, and mugs? You must travel their warehouse without being noticed by their security cameras. Take as many items you can before you are caught.

Controls:

WA or Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump
